DOC.brief_title: A Phase 2 , Double-masked , Randomized , Multi-center , Active-controlled , Dose-response Parallel-group Study Comparing Safety Ocular Hypotensive Efficacy Netarsudil ( AR-13324 ) Latanoprost Patients With Elevated Intraocular Pressure
